      • write

        public static void write(OAObject oaObj,
                         OAXMLWriter ow,
                         String tagName,
                         boolean bKeyOnly,
                         OACascade cascade)
        Called by OAXMLWriter to save object as xml. All ONE, MANY2MANY, and MANY w/o reverse getMethod References will store reference Ids, using the name of reference property as the tag.
        Note: if a property's value is null, then it will not be included. see #read
